caption:
A&E’s Flip This House star Peter Pasternack converted his Airbnbs into PadSplits in 2023 after issues with damages, rule violations, and payment issues. He says, “PadSplit is the future of rentals. My gross is well over double.”

Peter’s monthly net income jumped from $2,500 to $4,600.

“With PadSplit, I like that it’s not all or nothing whether it is rented or not. If one bedroom isn’t booked, you still make money on the others. I converted the first side of my duplex, and within 24 hours, all my rooms were booked,” says Peter.
